projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.bodyText: - Crafted an advanced movie recommendation system using content-based filtering, powered by a FastAPI ML backend and a React frontend.

projects.title: Hotel Booking Platform
projects.bodyText: - Designed an interactive hotel reservation platform with a ReactJS, HTML, and CSS frontend, driven by a Node.js, Express.js backend and MongoDB data integration.

projects.title: College Compass Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- College Compass: A data-driven platform, powered by NCES & IPEDS, offering in-depth visualizations on US higher education trends using Angular UI, Flask backend, PostgreSQL database, and D3.js visual presentations. 
 - Server-side Backbone: Harnesses Flask for robust data operations and API delivery, empowering students to make informed college decisions.

projects.title: AI Chatbot
projects.bodyText: - Cloud-based chatbot leveraging dynamic datasets and centralized MySQL for highly customizable interactions.
